title: Percentage of e-commerce in total U.S. Q4 retail sales 2010 to 2019
yAxis: Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales for 10 number of Quarters.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales and Q4 '10 has the lowest Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales.
There is a difference of 6.9 between the maximum Quarter Q4 '19 and minimum Quarter Q4 '10.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales for 10 number of Quarters.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales and Q4 '10 has the lowest Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales for 10 number of Quarters.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales and Q4 '10 has the lowest Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales.
There is a difference of 6.9 between the maximum Quarter Q4 '19 and minimum Quarter Q4 '10.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales in the y axis.
The Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '10.
The second highest Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales is appeared to be the Quarter Q4 '18.
The highest Quarter Q4 '19 has 6.9 more Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales than the lowest Quarter Q4 '10.
Quarter Q4 '19 is higher than any other Quarters with value 11.5, followed by Q4 '18, and Q4 '17. Down to Quarter Q4 '10 with the lowest value 4.6.
Overall Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales has lowered over the Quarters.
The lowest value 4.6 at Q4 '10 is almost 1.55 times smaller than the average value 7.43.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 74.3.
